page.title: 02Employment in Dale
page.content: In this area there are 149 people between the ages of 18 and 60.They are employed as follows: Agriculture---------20 P.O.---------1 Engineering/Factory-11 Nursing------3 Coastguards---------7 Armed forces-3 Secretarial---------4 Shop---------3 Domestic/Handyman---10 Boatyard-----5 Innkeeper/Restaurant2 Milk/Petrol--2 Students(college)---7 Pilot--------1 Total = 85 The rest are unemployed/housewives/ retired. There are 47 people over the age of 60 and 48 children below the age of 18 - making the total population 244.
